introduction: The second series of bouquets, all shot in ecologically sensitive locations, follows on from the work carried out through Bouquets 1-10 and Bouquets 21-30, which consisted of creating movement, transformation, and evolution of images through positioning them directly during the recording. The weather and a series of technical setbacks caused by this way of “weaving” the frames in-camera delayed its completion. Because of that, from a chronological standpoint, the series of bouquets numbered 21 through 30 comes before Bouquets 11-20.
